snippet.title: Children of a Dead Earth Trailer
snippet.description:
Original Gameplay Trailer for Children of a Dead Earth

Newer Trailer is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tiIh4Xw2bnQ

The Most Scientifically Accurate Space Warfare Simulator Ever Made

REAL SCIENCE, REAL TECHNOLOGY - Every technology in game was implemented using actual equations from engineering textbooks and white papers, from the exhaust velocity of the nuclear thermal rockets, to the thermal expansion stress of the railguns when firing.

CAMPAIGN AND SANDBOX MODES - Assume the role of an admiral and fight through a storyline chronicling the descent of the solar system into war. Or simply play in the sandbox, designing ships and pitting them against one another.

EXTREMELY ACCURATE ORBITAL MECHANICS - With a full N-Body Simulator, all manner of orbital dynamics are supported, from Orbital Perturbation, Gravity Slingshots, Hyperbolic Trajectories, and Lagrange Point Orbits.

1:1 SCALE - The solar system is modeled perfectly to scale. The sizes of planets and moons are just as enormous as they are in real life, and the distances between planets are equally vast.

FREEFORM SHIP DESIGN - Build your spacecrafts out of rockets, propellant tanks, weapons, powerplants, radiators, and crew modules. Wrap it all up with multiple armor layers, and maybe a Whipple Shield to boot.

Windows and Mac

http://childrenofadeadearth.com/
https://www.facebook.com/childrenofadeadearth
https://twitter.com/QSwitched
http://childrenofadeadearth.boards.net/
https://childrenofadeadearth.wordpress.com/
